availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1863-1867

body.p: A Descriptive List of Robbers as follows

Thos Jenkins about five feet and Ten Inches High. light Hair. Hazel. Eyes. and little stooped Shoulder hardly sufficient to discover at a distance and will weigh about 170 pounds -- lives in Mercer County near Duncansville. Ky
Anthony Smith is about Five feet & eight inches in height. Black hair Dark Eyes. and will weigh about one hundred & Eighty Pounds. Lives in Washington County near Cornishville. Ky
John Bishop is about Five feet three inches in height and has Light hair Hazel Eyes -- fine voice. and weighs about One hundred & Thirty Pounds. and lives in Mercer County near Duncansville Ky
